name: eBook Pro eBook File
summary: An EBK file is an eBook file created by eBook Pro, a program used to create eBooks and protect copyrighted information. It stores a compressed and encrypted version of an eBook and can be read using the free eBook Viewer when proper user credentials are supplied.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: The Internet Marketing Center eBook Pro
The Internet Marketing Center eBook Pro Viewer
